There were no other sightings in Little Rock on or around October 17th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in my jeep rubicon after getting back into the car from academy sports store. it's a typical suburbia mall (michaels, dollar store, etc...). it was approx 7:00pm and starting to get dark at this point. i was looking out of the top\roof of my jeep. i just got this car & had the "freedom top" removed & i love to look out of it, etc... well, i look up & i see what i think to be a bright star and\or planet. i was about to take out my iphone & use the google star map app to see what it was. but then, the light started moving about. it moved slowly at first from a stationary position. initially, i figured maybe it was an airliner or c-130. i am in the usaf and so is my husband. i am a jag and he is a c-130 pilot. then i thought to myself...that's way too high for a c-130 and a commercial plane would not fly that way. to be clear, it was very high up. from my perspective, it looked like a planet. but, when it moved, it would lurch forward 2 to 3 inches (so imagine you are looking at a star & it just moves 3 inches forward in the sky....but in actuality it is obviously a large distance). the light would take a zig zag type path; pause, and then move in an "l" pattern, pause, and then continue to move in random patterns. i watched it for a good 25-30 minutes. it was directly above my head so it started to hurt my neck after so long! i called my husband of course telling him what i saw. he said he recently saw a weather balloon while flying and it could be a weather balloon b\c the wind could move it in a certain way. i told him no - this was not simply b\c of the distance the object moved. i took pictures of it with my iphone. i had to zoom all the way in & then take the pictures. of course they are not very good b\c of the quality. i tried to take a video but i could not zoom with the video feature. i wanted to let you guys know & see if anyone else reported anything similar? thanks for taking the time to read this & please don't hesitate to contact me if you need any more info. please note: the pictures are horrible quality. i had to zoom the cell phone to the max & it was still hard to see the object. i can attach them but it's hard to see it. thanks.
Summary: The light moved errratically & then would stop for 2 minutes & then would move about again in random patterns.
